explains: n. 篮子；一篮的量；（篮球运动的）篮；投篮得分
wordGroup: basket case 四肢不全的人；完全伤残者；完全没有希望的人
a basket of currencies [经]笼统货币；一篮子货币
bread basket 产粮区；面包篮；谷物产品

sentences.en: There was a complimentary basket of fruit in our room.
sentences.cn: 我们房间里有一篮免费赠送的水果。

sentences.en: He saw the dog's twitching nose poke out of the basket.
sentences.cn: 他看见那条狗颤搐的鼻子从篮子里露出来。

sentences.en: The dollar has fallen 6.5 percent this year against a basket of currencies from its largest trading partners.
sentences.cn: 美元对其最大贸易伙伴们的一篮子货币今年贬值了6.5%。
